TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit JwtBearerAppBuilderExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class JwtBearerAppBuilderExtensions abstract sealed
public ref class JwtBearerAppBuilderExtensions abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Extension methods to add OpenIdConnect Bearer authentication capabilities to an HTTP application pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder UseJwtBearerAuthentication(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder app) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseJwtBearerAuthentication (app As IApplicationBuilder) As IApplicationBuilder

Docs.param: The to add the middleware to.
Docs.summary: Adds the middleware to the specified , which enables Bearer token processing capabilities. This middleware understands appropriately formatted and secured tokens which appear in the request header. If the Options.AuthenticationMode is Active, the claims within the bearer token are added to the current request's IPrincipal User. If the Options.AuthenticationMode is Passive, then the current request is not modified, but IAuthenticationManager AuthenticateAsync may be used at any time to obtain the claims from the request's bearer token. See also http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749
Docs.returns: A reference to this instance after the operation has completed.

<Extension()> Public Function UseJwtBearerAuthentication (app As IApplicationBuilder, options As JwtBearerOptions) As IApplicationBuilder

Docs.param: The to add the middleware to.
A that specifies options for the middleware.
Docs.summary: Adds the middleware to the specified , which enables Bearer token processing capabilities. This middleware understands appropriately formatted and secured tokens which appear in the request header. If the Options.AuthenticationMode is Active, the claims within the bearer token are added to the current request's IPrincipal User. If the Options.AuthenticationMode is Passive, then the current request is not modified, but IAuthenticationManager AuthenticateAsync may be used at any time to obtain the claims from the request's bearer token. See also http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749
Docs.returns: A reference to this instance after the operation has completed.
